This sport originated in England during the 12th century, where citizens would play in meadows and roads by kicking and punching a ball. This invasion game has the most fans in the world with 3.5 billion estimated fans!

questions.answer: This position of a sport where you score by putting the ball into a basket is the team’s designated shooter. This player is only able to access the offensive third of the court. questions.answer: This famous 1.91 meter basketball player was born in the same hospital as Lebron James. He is the son of two former athletes, one who was a college volleyball player, and one who played in the NBA for 16 seasons. This famous basketball player is known for his extraordinary 3 pointers and was the first to win the MVP award in a unanimous decision in 2016.
